title: We Won’t Be Silenced – Why We’re Moving To Substack
cleaned_text: AND Magazine is in the process of shifting its content to Substack. We made the decision to make this move[…]

opengraph.title: We Won’t Be Silenced – Why We’re Moving To Substack -
opengraph.description:
AND Magazine is in the process of shifting its content to Substack.  We made the decision to make this move after many months of discussion and consideration.



The sad reality of maintaining a news and commentary site based on ad revenue is that we are dependent on the goodwill and impartiality of our commercial partners in guaranteeing we receive that
